name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench, grip barbell shoulder-width apart, lower to chest, press up

name: Back Squat
instructions: Position barbell on upper back, feet shoulder-width apart, squat down, drive up

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand over bar, grip with hands outside legs, lift by extending hips and knees

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip, pull body up until chin over bar

name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position, lower body to ground, push back up

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder height, press overhead, lower with control

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, curl up by flexing biceps, lower slowly

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Support body on hands, lower by bending elbows, push back up

name: Bent-over Row
instructions: Hinge at hips, hold barbell, pull to lower chest, lower with control

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into lunge position, lower back knee, push back to start

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit on machine, place feet on platform, push away by extending legs

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Sit on machine, place feet on the edge of the platform, push away by extending legs
